channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Picadilly Underpass work is too slow and choking traffic, 24th June
item.description:
I donâ€™t understand how there can continue to be work on the Picadilly underpass requiring its continued closure. I have never once see actual construction work happening on the underpass. Meanwhile its closure is completely choking traffic in central London and making it impossible to move between Knightsbridge or Kensington and Mayfair or the City. This is a very important commercial corridor. Disgraceful to cause this much congestion with no works being done, all for a ventilation system.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Piccadilly Underpass, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Telephone cabinet flapping open, 24th June
item.description:
This cabinet is flapping open and blocking the pavement. It needs to be repaired. It has been like this for months

item.title: Tree branches need pruning - very low hanging, 24th June

item.title: Durrington Road is very dirty, when is our street swept?, 24th June
item.description:
I cannot remember seeing Durrington Road being swept recently. I would like to know when streets are scheduled for sweeping and if this could be done urgently. The street is very unsightly and a problem when people with mobility problems are out walking.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Durrington Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Trees require urgent watering, 24th June
item.description:
The trees in planters along the High Street near Wetherspoons urgently require watering. This is an issue that recurs every summer. It stands to reason that in hot dry weather the trees need more frequent watering! Why is this not done? The trees die without water.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 221, High Street, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
